column1: Little Goat Diner////Recently moved to Chicago (from Atlanta) and I can say
column3: the best food I've had in the city. I ordered the biscuits and gravy
column4: because I was missing southern staples. Don't tell my grandma
column5: but this was the best gravy I've had in my life. Plus it was so filling! All the sides are truly meal sized. I'd suggest splitting a side between 2-3 people. The cheeses covered hasbrowns we're enormous and had the perfect combination of crispy/crunchy and ooey gooey cheesiness. If you ever want real comfort food with the city style atmosphere make sure to drop in for a bite!
